display_long_description:
# Exorcism Agency Overview
Exorcism Agency is a multiplayer exorcism game. You’ll step into the shoes of exorcists exploring creepy spots and featuring the full exorcism process, from detection to hunting.  
[media]

# Your Mission Start
You’ll starting your journey from “Haunted Village”  then step to the extreme hard“Forbidden Campus.” Face against 10+ ghost types like “Evil Clown” and “Crawl Woman,” using 20+ tools like EMF detectors, Spirit boxes, Salt gunto gather evidence and exorcise it.
[media]

# Explore the story hidden behind 
This game base on a hidden tragic story, making this a journey of understanding. If you dive deep. You will linkage the things piece by piece!
[media]

# Team work is much more fun. 
Play with friends as a detective, guardian, or support. It was much more fun and you will both enjor it. 

# Elite level exorcism equipment 
Powerful features above standard. Some of that are amazing like Frozen Gun/Tesla Gun Plus/Polariod Plus and etc...Each of that was unique!
[media]
# High Learning Curve 
This is not a simple game. You should Join our Discord at **https://discord.gg/XTQSvRyuNs**  to get more tips and equipments to fill your learning curve. This is a thrilling supernatural adventure! And we are waiting you in the game!
See you there!!

[media]
